mainText:
Steve,
If every CEO had your talent, drive and vision, we would be a thriving 
country right now.
We need more Steve Jobses to bring this country back.  So sad to lose 
him.
Apple will thrive forever, for it was born from this genius...Steve has laid the foundation.... Apple has only begun to touch the 
lives of the world.
1 of a trillion fans!
author: Cathleen
